alert.note: Alert for Clermont; Clinton; Greene; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:50AM EDT until April 01 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hamilton County in southwestern Ohio... Northern Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... Warren County in southwestern Ohio... Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Southern Greene County in west central Ohio... * Until 130 AM EDT. * At 1250 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mason, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Middletown, Mason, Lebanon, Springboro, Sharonville, Wilmington, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, Wyoming, Blanchester, Finneytown, Waynesville, New Vienna, Morrow, Highpoint and Remington. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 14 and 61. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 12 and 17, and between mile markers 29 and 30. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southwestern and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southwestern and west central Ohio.
